product_name: Suunto Ambit2 R GPS Multifunction Watch
long_description: The Suunto Ambit2 R GPS Multifunction Watch enhances your running experience via a GPS and accelerometer that provide accurate pace, speed, cadence, distance and full route navigation. Training plans and running apps make it easy to improve and keep track of every aspect of your performance. Plan, analyze and share your runs on Movescount.com; choose from dozens of running-specific Suunto Apps to further customize your training experience. Enjoy accurate route navigation with up to 12 hrs. of battery life with GPS turned on. Training functions include speed, pace, distance, running cadence and training plans. ANT+ wireless compatibility with optional heart rate monitor and foot pod (heart rate monitor and foot pod not included). Key outdoor functions include route navigation, track back, GPS altitude and a compass. The Suunto Ambit2 R GPS Multifunction Watch is water-resistant to 50m (164 ft.).
short_description: The Suunto Ambit2 R GPS Multifunction Watch enhances your running experience via a GPS and accelerometer that provide accurate pace, speed, cadence, distance and full route navigation.
